DIALOGUE: DIRECTED BY BRYAN SPICER REVISED DRAFT OCTOBER 31 1994

In a time of great strife, a legendary interdimensional being known as Zordon, came to the city of Angel Grove to establish a vanguard in the never ending struggle against evil. with the aid of his trusted assistant, Alpha 5, the noble master sought out six extraordinary teenagers and gave them the power to transform into an unstoppable fighting force. In time of great need, the young heroes could now call upon colossal assault vehicles known as "Zords". while the identity of the six remained a guarded secret, their courageous exploits soon became the stuff of Legend, earning them the title... The Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.
Once we hit the target zone we've got fifteen seconds to make the drop.
The Stealth Eagle is about to fly.
Five seconds to the target zone!
Be the eagle. Be the eagle.
Be the swallow. Be the swallow...
Okay, so the firemen landed four out of six inside the target --
Somebody wanna keep chose bowlers in line.
Hey dad, get with the program!
Ladies and gentlemen, it's Angel Grove High
And that's one! A perfect landing!
Three for three. Look at `em go!
That's five perfect landings! Now it's all up to Tommy Oliver.
Congratulations - the Observatory's got a new lease on life.
Awesome! Ryan's Comet is passing over in two days!
Stealth Eagle, huh? The Lame Duck is more like it!
We're here at the World Center Construction Site, where a mysterious object was just uncovered in a freak accident in which one workman suffered minor injuries...
... Angel Grove Police have cordoned off the area until it can be determined whether or not the unidentified object poses any threat. The injured workman was quoted as saying...
It's one smooth move and then you've gotta explode off the top.
Hey, no Karate on the patio!
So, what're the plans for the weekend?
Aisha and.I are checking out a new dance spot.
I'll be at the Observatory Sunday.
We should throw a little comet shindig.
The earth was hurtling toward us at seven hundred miles per hour, and we knew at that moment that we were facing death straight in the eye.
What's up, Alpha? Rangers, we need you at the Command Center, L.R.N. !
Ay, yi, yi, yi, yi ! Our thermionic-sensors have been hit by a CATACLYSMIC surge of evil!
Rangers, you must act swiftly. The planet is in GRAVE danger!

Six thousand years ago a morphological being known as Ivan Ooze, ruled the world with a reign of unparalleled terror. Finally, a rebel factor known as the "Order of the Meledon" lured him into a hyperlock chamber and buried him deep underground.
In a place that came to be known as Angel Grove.
The chamber has been accidently UNCOVERED! You must return it to the depths. or anyone should open it and Ivan is released!
To assist you I have retro-fitted your helmets with new Opti-Scan devices.
Use extreme caution, Rangers. You are dealing with an evil here that is beyond ALL comprehension.

Another Saturday night and I'm traipsing around the galaxy with the THREE LITTLE PIGS! My mother warned me this would happen! Rita, she said, after 89 marriages you might wanna think about throwing in the towel. Why didn't I listen to her?!
Uh... Kurt... you might wanna take a look at this.
No need to wake him. In fact, why don't you take a little nap yourself.
Hey bonehead, get off my hoof!
After two thousand years of searching... I have finally found you.
SILENCE! Where did you FIND this rabid little rodent, anyway?!
Mordant's my second cousin three times removed on my mother's side. He`s just visiting for the summer.
Well put a muzzle on him!
What... you spent two thousand years looking for this tub of SNOT!
Don't you ever have anything nice to say?!
Well, if I did I certainly wouldn't say it to you!
For your information this is not just your average, run-of-the- mill tub of snot !
You're trying to tell me there`re different levels of snot?!
Ladies and Gentlemen... the OOZE is back!!
I am Lord Zedd, sworn enemy of all that is good and decent. It is a supreme honor to finally meet you.
How can I ever repay you?
Do you recall the name... Zordon of Eltare?
I want you to destroy Zordon, so that my evil may once again reign SUPREME. I will not only destroy him, I will OBLITERATE his entire being. It will be like Zordon of Eltare never EXISTED!
Here's his address. "... left off Interstate 12?!" What's an "interstate"?
It's like a freeway. How long have you been locked up? !
We shall leave you to weave your wicked ways.
Now we go out on the town. First dinner, then dancing, then --
Remind me to have a word with Alpha about his teleporting calculations.
... Let's take a look over there. It looks like it's been opened!
You haven't by any chance seen a ... morphological being lurking around?
The only thing I've seen is you teenagers. And you know... if there's one thing in the world I reeeeally hate.... It's TEENAGERS
You're too kind. Allow me to introduce myself. I am the infamous, world-reviled, universally despised, IVAN OOZE!
Well, pack your bags cause we're sending you back where you came from!
Gee, a teenager with a big mouth. Not much has changed in six thousand years.
we're not just teenagers, raisin- head.
We're the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers!
Power Rangers, huh? So Zordon is still using a bunch of rug-rats to do his dirty work. And speaking of rats...
From this moment forth, the world as you know it SHALL CEASE TO EXIST!
Alpha, my sensors tell me the Rangers were too late! Ivan is on his way here! Hey, NOBODY enters the Command Center without a power coin!
Gee... pretty fancy-shmancy. I guess if you invest your money well over SIXTY centuries you can buy something pretty nice.
Welcome to Wiener World. May I take your order, please?
You haven't changed, Ooze. You're still picking on creatures smaller than yourself.

Put a cork in it "Z" . Ten minutes out of the egg and I'm already listening to one of your lectures. the Supreme Ruler of the most foul Empire in the Universe. I was the King of Calamity. The Duke of Destruction. The big man on campus! And then you came along. You locked me into your stuffy little hyperlock-chamber and tossed me into the depths like yesterdays TRASH!
It worked for six thousand years.

Do you have any idea what it's like to be cooped up in a rotten egg for six thousand years? It's BORING! Not to mention I've had a Charlie horse since the Renaissance! But now the tables are turned. Now... ... it's time to pay the PIPER!
Oh, the things that I have missed. The BLACK PLAGUE!
And now, finally, I have the strength to DESTROY your pathetic powers FOREVER!!
YOU WON'T GET AWAY WITH THIS!
I've got a NEWS flash for you LIGHT-BRIGHT -- I ALREADY HAVE!
You put your left probe in, you put your left probe out, you put your left probe in and you shake it all about. You do the hokey- pokey and you turn yourself around...
Let's teach these vermin a few manners.
Hold it... I heard something over there.
They're on the other side of that wall.
SABA SABER? What a DREAM I was having!
Come on, guys... ... what happened here?...
I'll GET you my pretty, and your little DOG toa!!
He must've blown an anitromic demodulator! Oh, no...
Outside of his time warp he's aging at a vastly acellerated rate!
We have to get you back inside your time warp.
I'm afraid that's impossible... The power has been destroyed. It's gone... The Zords, the weapons... all of it. The Mighty Morphin Power Rangers are no more.
Zordon... you can't leave us. Ever since you came into our lives... you've been like another father `to us all.-
... You must be strong... Ivan almost overthrew the planet once... and now I'm afraid he has the strength to see his scheme through.
I do not LIKE Green Eggs and Ham! I do not like them, Sam-I-am!
There has to be something we can do.
Alpha. Is there any way we can defeat this monster? Any way at all?
... Perhaps there is a way... I have heard tales of another power.
... They say that somewhere beyond the Hyperion Constellation there exists a mythological power that is beyond all comprehension.
How can we get to it?
As the legend goes, the power is impossible to obtain.
We have to try, Alpha. It's our only hope. It's far too dangerous. Zordon would never allow it.
If we don't try, Zordon won't survive!
If Ivan Ooze isn't stopped, nobody will survive.
Ay, yi, yi, yi. The legend speaks of a Master Warrior who lives on the planet Phaedos... This is the only person who knows the secrets of the power.
Zordon's going to have my orbicular spheroids when he hears out about this!
This is an emergency reserve of morphonic emissions. It should be enough to get -you there.
There is one problem. I only have enough reserve to send you Phaedos... I can't bring you back.
So how do we get back?
... You'll have to pray that the legends are true.
You're sure you want to do this?! The Rangers share purposeful looks.
Ay, yi, yi, yi. They're DOOMED!! How could he let them slip through his hands?! He's no better than the rest of the hired help around here!
According to the TX Tracker, they're headed for Phaedos.
I'm gonna fire that slimeball so fast his not gonna know what hit him!
You garlic-sucking DINGLEBRAIN! The Rangers are going after the Great Power I thought you said this guy was the Master of Disaster? He's nothing but a slime- infested, jelly-bellied blob of --
How dare you?! Nobody shuts up Rita but me!
Sorry, slick, there's been a slight'change of plans. The "booger man" is taking over.
Nobody double-crosses Lord Zedd and lives!
Zedd's gonna kick this snotball into next week!
This is all your fault! If you'd taken me out tonight like you were suposed to, none of this would've happened.
Now you have a choice, either serve me, or join those insufferable cheesedongs.
We never liked the cheesedongs in the first place.
Couldn''t stand them -- low-class all the way. And did you catch a whiff of their BREATH?! It's like having a conversation with a couple of ONIONS! Not to mention...
He's just visiting for the summer. Now what about,the Rangers, oh hideous one?
Tengu Warriors, you will fly to Phaedos, find the Power Rangers... and TEAR THEM APART!
Mordant, go with them and report back to me!
You know boss, I'd really like to help out but I've got this gastronomic condition which rules out all space trave--
Isn't this just TYPICAL! We finally do somebody a good turn and just look what happens!
From now on it's E-V-I-L, NO exceptions! It just goes to show, ya never go into business with a booger.
Ay, yi, yi, yi! The filamentary transistors have malfunctioned!
This puddle thing is really getting on my nerves.
Let's see if we can find this Master warrior.
Taking over the world is one thing. It's finding good help to run it for you that's the killer.
You want me to place a few calls?
No need. I'm going to use the young minds of Angel Grove.
No offense, boss, but they might find you a little disgusting.

Yes, well, I suppose you'd know a little something about that. Not to worry. I'll ever so gently lure them in and mold them into an army of devils! And what better way to entice them ... than with a little Ivan's Ooze?!
But boss, what about their parents?
Ah, the old and doddering. I'm going to SCOURGE their puny minds, reducing them to ZOMBIE'S. And then I'll put them to work rebuilding my empire.
I understand you're looking for a few new assistants.
Well put your mind to rest `cause now you've got the best.
What is this?! I advertised for brilliant and good looking assistants!
Hi, I'm brilliant. And I'm good looking.
Bulk... why don't we give Mr. Peep here a chance to think it over?
I was just thinking about Zordon... everything we've been through together.
You know, meeting Zordon... teaming up with you guys, it's the best thing that's ever happened to me.
It's the best thing that's ever happened to all of us.
We'll get this warrior... save Zordon... and send that SLIMEBALL Ivan Ooze back to the SEWER he crawled out of.
What's the matter with you woodpeckers! Take this guy out!
The Tengu Warriors my butt! The Tengu TURKEYS is more like it!
Hey, aren't you bird-brains forgetting something?!
Wow! That was amazing for such a little dude!
You're trespassing. Now state your business.
We're looking for the Master Warrior. Do you know where we can find him?
The Master Warrior doesn't entertain visitors -
But we have to find him. Our leader Zordon is dying.
The lady asked you a question.
Huh ... Oh, uh, we re, ah...
He was attacked by this horrific being -- Ivan Ooze.
Ivan Ooze is free?! We are all in mortal danger!

Boys and girls, girls and boys, gather round and feast your eyes. This ain't sludge and this ain't guck... this is the one and only Ivan's Ooze! Yesireebob. It's ooey, gooey and even kind of chewy. But best of all it's FREE!
So where'd this guy come from?
Uh... that's classified, top secret, confidential, undercover information.
If we told you -- we'd have to kill you.
Come on, come all -- it's an COZE FREE FOR ALL!
Mine seems to be a little undercooked.
Add a few dried weevils and you'll never know the difference.
Listen, we appreciate your hospitality, but we really don't have much time.
What do you know of the Great Power?
Only that we need it to defeat Ivan Ooze.
It is said that to those who possess the Power... all things are possible.

In another time, another dimension. It was brought here long ago by the "Nathadians", a people who are now all but extinct. They built an impenetrable stone Monolith to store the power and keep it from their enemies. For thousands of years, beings from all over the Universe have tried to obtain it... ALL have perished.
So how can we get to it?
The only way to obtain the power is to achieve the highest state of being...
And how do we do that?
By learning the ancient art of Ninjetti. It is the Genesis of what you on earth have come to know as the Ninja. It is the perfect union of mind, body and spirit.
Look, Zordon doesn't have much longer to live. And for all we know, Angel Grove could already be under attack. We don't have TIME for this.
You don't understand. If you do not have the Ninjetti, the power will destroy you. To reach the Monolith we must traverse the Neola jungle. We will train today, and set out on foot tomorrow.
He wants to know if you'd like a cube of sugar in your tea.
In the language of the Nathadians, "Nin" stands for "man", "jetti" stands for "animal". Ninjetti - man and animal, together as one. Now, put your hands inside the flame.
Now tell me... what do you see? I see... a bear
Aisha, you are the Bear, stalwart and bold.
Rocky, you are the Mighty Ape.
Close. Billy, you are the Wolf, cunning and swift.
I think its some kind of bird.
Kimberly, you are the Crane, agile and sublime.
Adam, you are the Frog, quick as lightning.
Tommy, you are the Falcon, Winged Lord of the Sky.

CHARACTER: How do you know so much about the

DIALOGUE: I... am the sole living descendant of the "Nathadians". Now prepare yourselves for the most intense physical and mental training known to man and animal.
I can't find my dad either.
That guy was the student body President
The crane maintains it's agility through the perfect harmony of mind, body and spirit.
Let's see you do it . Ghun Phnug Gnouphl.
Snoggle, we don't have time for you to show off
The ape is strong, but more importantly it is flexible and free.
The wolf relies on it's enhanced senses to guide it... He can hear what we cannot hear, he can smell what we cannot smell.
The frog remains still and silent while it assesses its target... then strikes out in the blink of an eye.
The bear is sturdy as a towering tree. Nothing can uproot it.
Girl, you've got to be kidding me.
The falcon never struggles with the air, but rather becomes one with it. JOIN WITH THE FORCES OF NATURE!
You can do this. You can do this. You can do this...
... Alpha, I am deeply concerned about the Rangers...
I told them it was too dangerous, but they wouldn't listen.
... We must try to communicate with them.
Perhaps if I could locate a vertical-deflector then I could assemble a holographic-comlink.
Each of you must reach deep within and draw upon your natural instincts... Only then will you know the way of the Ninjetti. Rest for a few hours. We will continue at daybreak.
So where are we supposed to sleep?
That guy's cruisin' for a bruisin'.
I've never been this sore in my life.
Do you guys really think we can pull this off?
Maybe if we had more time.
... I wonder... We've been relying on our Morphin Powers for so long... maybe we've forgotten how to rely on ourselves.
Ladies and gentlemen, Simon says... STOP!
Simon says... stand on one foot!
You didn't say "Simon says". Simon says SHUT UP!!! Now, as soon as I give the word I want all of you to start digging. Do I make myself perfectly --
This is the Iast time I use parents for anything!
Let's pick it up here! I've got a schedule to keep. In twenty four hours the ooze is gonna hit the fan!
What kind of landing was that?! These clowns are a menace to the sky
Oh, it couldn't've gone better. The Power Rangers didn't know what hit them .
That's right. And then we threw one of them off a mountain and another one into a raqing river!
Well... we were about to finish them off... when this huge monster came out of nowhere!
Okay, maybe he wasn't so huge. But you should've seen the size of his STICKS
Did these sticks make a whistling sound?
Dulcea! That miserable, manipulating loathsome she-devil of a WITCH!!
How could you let them get away?! If Dulcea leads them to the Great Power, everything will be ruined! They must be OBLITERATED!
What're you talking about?! It wasn't my fault! You're the featherbrains that let them get away!
I call upon the Powers of Darkness to enrich the evil of my creatures by tenfold!
And now the coup de grace, to lead my tribe to victorious battle!
Where does he come up with this stuff?
Queen Tengu, lead-your warriors to Phaedos, FEAST YOURSELVES UPON THE POWER RANGERS AND BRING ME DULCEA!
You have been visited by the animal spirits... they have given you their blessing.
Thank you! Please! You're too kind. Finally. a little appreciation where it's deserved.
Right back at ya!- Now, WHO MISSES SCHOOL?!
AND WHO WANTS TO JOIN ME IN RAISING HELL ACROSS THE UNIVERSE?!
Can I have a word with you guys? What's really going on here?! Where are everybody's parents?
Like we said before, that's classified, top secret...
Look, Ivan wants me to go dump a load of garbage all over them.
Well, why didn't you say so?!
They're at the World Center Construction Site.
Dulcea... how do you and Zordon know each other?

We belonged to an interstellar Peace Keeping Force known as the "Order of the Meledan". Zordon was widely regarded as the finest Commander in the Galaxy. He was a true Legend... If it wasn't for him, the Universe would be a very different place from what it is today.
Over time our enemies were defeated... I returned to Phaedos, Zordon moved on to continue the struggle elsewhere. Until you kids showed up, I hadn't heard from him for centuries.

This is why I'm taking you to the Nathadian Monolith. That is why I'm teaching you the Ninjetti. If Zordon dies... then a piece of all of us dies... and the force of good within the Universe will be dealt an irreparable blow.
As soon as we've taken over the world I'm gonna change my name to Sir Mordant. Or how about MAJOR Mordant?!
How about the two of you shut Up and pay attention!!

Feast your eyes upon the exoskeleton of the barbaric HORNITOR! KEEP DIGGING. THE DREADFUL SCORPITRON SHOULD BE CLOSE BY. ONCE I HAVE MY ECTO-MORPHICON MACHINES UP AND RUNNING, I SHALL ANNIHILATE ANGEL GROVE... AND THEN... THE WORLD
We have to get out of here! Dig... dig... dig...
frequencies off one of the network satellites, I can send a long-range pulsar signal to within TWO FEET of the Rangers coordinates.
... I just pray we're not too late.
Angel Grove Police have been fielding hundreds of calls from concerned citizens as the number of missing gersons continues to grow
Are you bored with your work? Are you bored with your family Are you bored with your 1ife Well, come on down to Ooze City and LET'S GET STICKY!
The Monolith is there in the distance.
This is as far as I can take you.
I have taught you all that I know. Now you must achieve the Ninjetti on your own.
It is said that once you've reached the power... you have only ten triacs to release it.
About twenty seconds in your time.
And how do we release the power?
The legend goes that you release the power with the power.
That is a question that even I cannot answer. Remember, ten triacs. After that something bad will happen.
They say the power will throw off a super-heated, radioactive fireball, instantly reducing you to ash and bits of charred bone.
Ka'Alabas tor nartu En'Kata-Tay. May your animals watch over you.
Finally, after centuries of waiting, my Ecto-Morphicon machines are ready to take on the world!
GET THAT THING OUT OF MY FACE!
Oh, man, that was a rental!
Looks like a fine day for raising HELL!
YOU HAVE SERVED YOUR PURPOSE. NOW YOU WILL RETURN TO THE CONSTRUCTION SITE AND LEAP TO YOUR DEMISE!
Man, these are the last guys I wanted to see.
That's the only way to the Monolith...
The frog silently assesses its target, then strikes out...
... in the blink of an eye.
The bear is sturdy as a towering tree. Nothing can uproot it.
ANGEL GROVE... I'D LIKE TO INTRODUCE YOU TO A COUPLE OF MY NEAREST AND DEAREST FRIENDS... HORNITOR!
And his trimetallic partner in crime... SCORPITRON!!
THE BOYS ARE BACK IN TOWN!!!
That should do it. we won't be able to hear them, but they SHOULD be able to hear us. Here goes.
... the Mayor has declared a state of emergency and asked that the city be immediately evacuated. He has reiterated the need for everyone to remain calm.
Angel Grove has never before known such a crisis and we can now only pray for the swift arrival of the Power Rangers!
I guess these guys weren't so lucky.
We've come all this way for a rock wall?!
There should be a way to open it.
Release the power with the power.
Rangers... Ivan has invaded the city... time is running out...
Each of you are now in possession of miraculous skills... but only when the six become one will you have the strength to harness the Great Power.
Six become one... the combined forces of the Ninjetti.
I am the wolf, cunning and swift!
I am the crane, agile and sublime!
I am the bear, stalwart and bold!
I am the frog, quick as lightning!
And I am the Falcon, Winged Lord of the Sky!
Of course! The power is of another world. Another dimension.
Release the power WITH the power.
Release the power with the power.
I've got it! We use the mirrors to reflect the light back into itself!!
Yes, Snoggle... they now have the Great Power of the Ninjetti!
You've been brainwashed! This Ivan is no Wizard. He's some kind of DEMON!
You can't talk that way about our leader.
You gotta believe me -- he's EVIL!
Listen to me! Our parents are in danger! If we don't help them they're going to be killed!
We could take it with us.
Rangers... I'm afraid you're too late.
To those who possess the Great Power... all things are possible.
It's good to see you again, too.
AI, YI, YI, YI, YI Ivan s Ecto- Morphicon machines are leveling the city!
We've got news for you, Ivan...
The Power Rangers are BACK IN BUSINESS!!
Rangers, call for your new animal Zords!
Look, kid, I don't think you realize who you're dealing with.
I don't think he realizes who HE'S dealing with.
Hope you've got a good mechanic. WE GOT HIM!!
Let's TANGO! We need Ninja MEGAZORD POWER, NOW!
GO, Rangers! GO, Rangers! GO, Rangers! GO!
This guy is messing with the wrong teenagers! ENGAGING KNUCKLE ROCKETS!
SECOND COUSIN, THREE TIMES REMOVED. NOW GET OFF ME!
Time to recharge your batteries, FLOWER Rangers!
SYSTEM MALFUNCTION! OUR SEMI-CONDUCTORS ARE DOWN!
NEXT STOP, ANGEL GROVE FIRST NATIONAL!
One more blow like that and we're HISTORY!
The monorail is in trouble! I'm going in!
That's gotta be an eighty foot drop!
Everybody hold on tight. We're gonna send this sucker into OBLIVION!
You call yourself a hell-hound?! A basset hound is more like it. If you were a real outlaw you would've gotten me out of this blizzard HOURS ago!
This is the last time I marry a witch.
NOTHING can defeat the Powers of Darkness!
Wait a second... What time is it?
It's passing over earth as we speak! Trajectory coordinates are
We get Ivan into the Comets PATH--
I hope those Rangers put that lousy lowlife out of his misery!
Have you hugged your Zord today?
THREE DEGREES OFF THE COMETS TRAJECTORY!
Ay, yi, yi! The Rangers are going to be CRUSHED!
Don't lose hope yet, Alpha! 009843... 42... 41! WE'RE IN ALIGNMENT!
Desperate times call for desperate measures.
Bull's eye! FOUR SECONDS TO IMPACT!
We couldn't have done it better ourselves.

Rangers, by going after the Great Power, all of you knowingly put your lives at extreme risk... and in so doing you not only saved my life, you saved all of Angel Grove and the world from a reign of unthinkable terror.
It's not what you DID, it's what you DIDN'T do!
We tried to rescue you every chance we had!
Ouch!! Do you know what it's like to be stuck in a BLIZZARD FOR TWO DAYS?!
Are you trying to be funny?!
